text: Christopher "Chris" L Cubas is an American stand-up comedian, podcast host, and actor. Cubas appeared a number of times on comedian Doug Benson's podcast "Doug Loves Movies", and eventually joined Benson and The Alamo Drafthouse to launch The Movie Interruption, a live, weekly comedy show in Kansas City, Missouri. Cubas currently lives in Austin, Texas and hosts his own podcast, "CanceledPod". Cubas has also done some acting, appearing in Days of Delusion and Austin High in 2011. In addition, he starred in the movie: Chris Gets Some Money'. In March 2015, Cubas won Comedy Central's @midnight's #PointsMe challenge and appeared on the show on March 25. He reappeared on the show on June 17, 2015, January 7, 2016 and on July 26, 2016. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:People from Austin, Texas Category:People from New Paltz, New York Category:American men podcasters Category:American podcasters Category:American stand-up comedians Category:American male comedians Category:Comedians from New York (state) Category:21st-century American comedians
title: Chris Cubas
